title: Notice of V/Line industrial action on Monday 12, Friday 16, Monday 19 and Friday 23 February
articleContent:
Notice of V/Line industrial action on Monday 12, Friday 16, Monday 19 and Friday 23 February

News > Disruption

The Rail, Tram and Bus Union has notified V/Line of its intention to take industrial action involving a full train network closure between 3am and 7am on Monday 12, Friday 16, Monday 19 and Friday 23 February.

Passengers are advised to avoid travelling in the morning as a very limited coach replacement service will operate with significant delays expected.

V/Line is currently working on a service plan for each line and will communicate this to customers as soon as possible.

Regular information and updates will be published here at ptv.vic.gov.au, on the V/Line website, mobile app and social media so please check for updates before you travel.

Thank you for your patience and understanding during this time.
